    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Balon v zraku</string>
            <string language="en">Balloon in the air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ballon in der Luft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ballon dans le ciel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Balão no ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aerostato nell'aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπαλόνι στον αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Globo en el aire</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Baloni so lahko vrtoglavo lepi od spodaj navzgor.</string>
            <string language="en">Balloons can form extraordinary patterns when viewed from below.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">toplozračni balon</string>
            <string language="en">hot air balloon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">nebo</string>
            <string language="en">sky</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">košara</string>
            <string language="en">basket</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ballone können außerordentliche Muster bilden, 
wenn sie von unterhalb angesehen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les ballons peuvent former les configurations 
extraordinaires une fois visualisés de dessous.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os balões podem dar forma a testes padrões 
extraordinários quando vistos de abaixo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli aerostati possono formare i modelli 
straordinarii una volta osservati da sotto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα μπαλόνια μπορούν να διαμορφώσουν τα εξαιρετικά 
πρότυπα όταν εμφανίζονται από κάτω από.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los globos pueden formar modelos extraordinarios 
cuando están vistos de abajo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heißluftballon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Himmel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Korb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ballon à air chaud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ciel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">panier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">balão de ar quente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">céu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cesta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cielo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cestino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μπαλόνι καυτού αέρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
